general_advidory: As per IMD forecast, the Dhenkanal district is likely to experience light rainfall on some days with clear to cloudy sky. The wind speed is expected to be between 06-08 km/h. The maximum temperature will range between 27-28Â°C. Various crop-specific advisories have been provided for different crops such as groundnut, onion, paddy, sugarcane, black gram, green gram, brinjal, potato, mango, animal husbandry, and poultry.

groundnut.advisory: To manage the carrier of Bud necrosis disease (Thrips) during the primary stage of pest infestation, spray Neem Based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM. To manage Thrips chemically, spray Thiamethoxam 25% W.G or Acetamiprid 20% S.P. or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL.

onion.advisory: To manage purple blotch and Stemphylium leaf blight disease in onion, spray Mancozeb 75% WP or Difenoconazole 25% E.C or Tebuconazole 25.9% E.C.

paddy.advisory: Farmers those who have already transplanted should apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting at active tillering stage for high yielding paddy varieties.

sugarcane.advisory: Carry out planting of Sugarcane crop. To manage sett rot disease, apply Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% or foliar spray with Metalaxyl 8%.

black gram.advisory: To control Bihar hairy caterpillar in green gram and black gram crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C.

green gram.advisory: To control Bihar hairy caterpillar in green gram and black gram crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C.

brinjal.advisory: Little leaf of Brinjal is a mycoplasma disease which is transmitted by leafhopper. To manage this, spray Thiamethoxam 25 % WG or Flonicamid 50% WG.

potato.advisory: To control cut worm in potato crop, spray Chlorpyriphos 50% + Cypermethrin 5 % E.C.

mango.advisory: To manage mango hoppers, spray Imidacloprid 17.8% SL or Thiamethoxam 25% W.G or Acetamiprid 20% S.P.
